summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Blake Place Southwest and Vashon Place Southwest each from Southwest Othello Street to Southwest Fontanelle Street; and a certain other street and avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18915 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
